Package CCDD

Class CcddClassesComponent.ValidateCellActionListener

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddClassesComponent.ValidateCellActionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
Enclosing class:
CcddClassesComponent
abstract static class CcddClassesComponent.ValidateCellActionListener extends Object implements ActionListener
Action listener to validate the contents of the table cell currently being edited prior to performing an action. This prevents the action from being performed when the cell's contents is invalid (which causes a warning dialog to appear), allowing the invalid value to be corrected

    • table

      private final CcddJTableHandler table

  • Constructor Details

    • ValidateCellActionListener

      protected ValidateCellActionListener()
      Validate cell action listener. getTable should be overridden to provide the specific table to validate. If no table is specified then the action is performed

    • ValidateCellActionListener

      protected ValidateCellActionListener(CcddJTableHandler table)
      Validate cell action listener
      Parameters:
      table - Reference to the CcddJTableHandler table to check for cell validation; null perform the action with no validation check
